alert.note: Alert for Harnett; Hoke; Lee; Montgomery; Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 7:44PM EDT until June 26 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Moore County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Harnett County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Montgomery County in central North Carolina... Lee County in central North Carolina... North central Hoke County in central North Carolina... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 744 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Biscoe, or 12 miles east of Troy, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sanford, Southern Pines, Carthage, Pinehurst, Biscoe, Whispering Pines, Broadway, Robbins, Foxfire and Candor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
